By the time all the guests had arrived, Cory had managed to hide out upstairs. He really didn't want to be around this group, especially since they would most likely be drinking. These women being drunk never turned out well for Cory.

A knock on the door prompted Karen to invite her guests inside. In walked Rachel, her friend from work that was the same age as Karen and shared an equal hatred of men, but unlike Karen never really took good care of herself and had the large gut and ass to prove it. Behind her was Corys Aunt Trish, Karen's 41 year old younger sister. Both Trish and Rachel also decided to bring their daughters to the gathering. Amber, Corys bratty 18 year old cousin, and Stephanie, the 25 year old daughter of Rachel who still had a vendetta against Cory for an awkward date a few years ago.

Cory hoped to stay out of their sight, but it was not to be. Eventually as the drinks were poured and everyone had finished catching up socially, Cory would become the victim of their torment.

15.content:
Cory hated his job, but couldn't leave because it was pretty much the best paying job he was qualified for. It didn't help that his boss, Greg, was a complete asshole to him. Every chance he had, Fred made it his mission to make Cory miserable and flex his power. Today was going to be rougher than normal. Cory hadn't been doing very well lately and Greg wanted to see him in his office for a private meeting.

Greg was sitting behind his desk, a very smug look on his face as he reviewed the earnings report for Cory.
"Do you really think your work has been acceptable?" He asked in a condescending tone.

Cory was sweating. "N-no sir, but I know I can do bett..."
He was cut off.
"I don't want your excuses. You know, I'm supposed to let some people go this month and to tell you the truth, you're looking like some dead weight lately"

Cory was panicking.
"Please sir, I really need this job! I swear I'll do better, just please give me a chance!"

Greg was shaking his head, but then an idea struck him and a small grin formed on his face.
"Well, if you're really that desperate..." He paused for dramatic effect. "I think we might be able to work something out. Just between you and I"
15.title: His Boss, Greg

info.brief_description: 100gps awarded to decent chapters. A meek man is dominated by people in his life
info.description:
100gps will be awarded to all decent chapters. Please keep Third Person Perspective (for example, "What's going on?" Cory said, horrified)

Cory Sanders lives a pretty dull life. At age 26 he works a dead end job that barely pays the bills, he lives in a crappy apartment with a roommate he can barely stand, his family hates him, and his girlfriend treats him like crap. Things get more exciting, but certainly not in the way he would like, when the people in his life suddenly decide to dominate and humiliate Cory for no apparent reason. It's almost like the story of his life is being written by a pervy author with a sadistic streak

Pretty much anything goes, other than graphic violence. Cory can be tormented by both men and women.
